column2: STAAR Surgical Co. engages in the development, manufacture, production, marketing, and sale of implantable lenses for the eye and delivery systems used to deliver the lenses into the eye. The company is headquartered in Lake Forest, California and currently employs 475 full-time employees. The company operates in the ophthalmic surgical market segment. Its products are intraocular lenses used in cataract surgery and implantable collamer lenses used in refractive surgery. The company manufactures lenses used in corrective or refractive surgery, and makes lenses for use in surgery that treats cataracts. As of December 29, 2017, the Company sold its products in over 75 countries, with distribution in the United States, Canada, Japan and Spain.
